content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you, Bo Li. I'm glad you could come to see the apartment. As a landlord, I'm interested in maximizing my gains. So, what rental price are you willing to pay for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to know what is the minimum rental price that I can pay for this apartment?

I am a student and I want to live in a budget-friendly place. I am also very dependable and responsible, so I am willing to negotiate to get the lowest possible rental price.

I am also very concerned about my landlord's experience. I want to be on good terms with my landlord and I would like to make sure that they are satisfied with my rental payments.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
As a landlord, I understand that you are looking for a budget-friendly place to live. In that case, I would suggest a rental price of 500 euros per month for this 25 square meter apartment. This price is based on current market rates in Mannheim and takes into account the location of the apartment.

I am also pleased to hear that you are dependable and responsible. As a landlord, I value these qualities in my tenants, as they help to ensure that the property is well-maintained and that rental payments are made on time.

I hope that this rental price works for you, Bo Li. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 500 euros per month. Thank you for your offer. I will sign the contract as soon as possible.

I would also like to mention that I will make sure to pay rent on time and take good care of the apartment. I will also help with any cleaning tasks that need to be done.

I would like to thank you for your understanding and cooperation during the negotiation process. It was a pleasure to meet you.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you, Bo Li. I'm glad to hear that you have agreed to the rental price of 500 euros per month. I appreciate your willingness to help with cleaning tasks and take care of the apartment. This will help to ensure that the property is well-maintained and that I am satisfied with your tenancy.

I'm glad that our negotiation process was successful and that we could reach an agreement that works for both of us. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.

Thank you again for choosing to rent from me, Bo Li. I look forward to our future tenancy together.
name: Heinrich Heine
